document.full_text: the number of civilians, police and soldiers killed in violence in iraq rose in march, official figures showed on friday, just days after militants killed 58 people in the month's deadliest attack.
document.title: number of violent deaths rises in iraq in march
lines_and_colors: the number of civilians, police and soldiers killed in violence in iraq rose in march, official figures showed on friday, just days after militants killed 58 people in the month's deadliest attack.
